title: ICE when taking reference of an array element across crate border

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
Script to reproduce:

```
#!/bin/sh

cat > array.rs <<EOF
pub static ARRAY: &'static [int] = &[1];
EOF

cat > main.rs <<EOF
extern crate array;
use array::ARRAY;
static X: &'static int = &ARRAY[0];
pub fn main() {}
EOF

rustc --version
rustc array.rs --crate-type rlib
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc main.rs -L .
```

Version:

```
rustc 0.10-pre (092afdb 2014-03-22 00:56:47 -0700)
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
```

Output:

```
task 'rustc' failed at 'expected item, found unknown node (id=3)', /home/rsaarelm/local/rust/src/libsyntax/ast_map.rs:256
stack backtrace:
```
